title: AI analysis of speech may detect early dementia changes
description: LSU researchers used artificial intelligence to analyze speech patterns in older adults, finding that pauses during memory tasks may help detect and track early cognitive decline.
content: For decades, scientists have known that subtle changes in speech can signal changes in the brain. Using so-called “filler words” such as “um” and “you know” or long pauses are sometimes a quirk of speech, but can also indicate lurking neurological pr... [3710 chars]

description: Bhupendra Patel granted in-principle approval for the project on Tuesday in an effort to strengthen research and development in artificial intelligence| Business News
content:

title: China's economy looks more resilient than it feels amid trade tensions
description: By some measures, China's economy is looking resilient, with strong exports and breakthroughs in artificial intelligence
content:
By some measures, China’s economy is looking resilient, with strong exports and breakthroughs in artificial intelligence and other advanced technologies.

title: Entertainment and media industries shed 17K jobs in 2025
description: The entertainment and media industries bled more than 17,000 jobs in 2025, the latest in a brutal, ongoing contraction that's left newsrooms, studios and streaming giants hollowed out by consolidation, cost-cutting and the accelerating use of artificial intelligence.

title: Creators gain ground as audiences distrust AI
description: To build a creator-follower relationship, some creators are putting out artificial intelligence-led low-effort content, while others are opting for more authentic manmade creatives, said a TechCrunch report quoting industry executives. The report added that trust in creators has increased 21% year-on-year.
